danish_publication: Frimurerne skal mure på Babels tårn efter deres død. De bliver aldrig fattige, for de finder altid penge i deres seng. De døer altid pludselig. Den, der har forsét sig eller røber noget af hemmelighederne, de får blot en knappenål stukket i deres portræt, så døer de. Således gik det én, der boede oppe i Trudslev.
english_publication: The Freemasons are supposed to work on the tower of Babel after they die. They never become poor, because they always find money in their beds. They always die suddenly. Those who commit offenses or reveal any of the secrets, they get a needle poked into their portrait, and then they die. That's what happened to one who lived up in Trudslev.

etk_index.heading_danish: Om Fanden og forbund med ham
etk_index.heading_english: About the Devil and being in league with the Devil
